camel.source.endpoint.nodes.name: camel.source.endpoint.nodes
camel.source.endpoint.nodes.description: The address of the nodes composing the cluster.

camel.source.endpoint.resultHeader.name: camel.source.endpoint.resultHeader
camel.source.endpoint.resultHeader.description: The header that wil carry the result.

camel.source.endpoint.transportClassName.name: camel.source.endpoint.transportClassName
camel.source.endpoint.transportClassName.description: The class name (fqn) of the Atomix transport

camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.name: camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.source.endpoint.defaultResourceCon.name: camel.source.endpoint.defaultResourceConfig
camel.source.endpoint.defaultResourceCon.description: The cluster wide default resource configuration.

camel.source.endpoint.ephemeral.name: camel.source.endpoint.ephemeral
camel.source.endpoint.ephemeral.description: Sets if the local member should join groups as PersistentMember or not. If set to ephemeral the local member will receive an auto generated ID thus the local one is ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.readConsistency.name: camel.source.endpoint.readConsistency
camel.source.endpoint.readConsistency.description: The read consistency level. One of: [ATOMIC] [ATOMIC_LEASE] [SEQUENTIAL] [LOCAL]

camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.source.endpoint.synchronous
camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.atomix-messaging.configu.name: camel.component.atomix-messaging.configurationUri
camel.component.atomix-messaging.configu.description: The path to the AtomixClient configuration

camel.component.atomix-messaging.nodes.name: camel.component.atomix-messaging.nodes
camel.component.atomix-messaging.nodes.description: The nodes the AtomixClient should connect to

camel.component.atomix-messaging.resultH.name: camel.component.atomix-messaging.resultHeader
camel.component.atomix-messaging.resultH.description: The header that wil carry the result.

camel.component.atomix-messaging.transpo.name: camel.component.atomix-messaging.transportClassName
camel.component.atomix-messaging.transpo.description: The class name (fqn) of the Atomix transport

camel.component.atomix-messaging.bridgeE.name: camel.component.atomix-messaging.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.atomix-messaging.bridgeE.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.atomix-messaging.basicPr.name: camel.component.atomix-messaging.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.atomix-messaging.basicPr.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.atomix-messaging.default.name: camel.component.atomix-messaging.defaultResourceConfig
camel.component.atomix-messaging.default.description: The cluster wide default resource configuration.

camel.component.atomix-messaging.ephemer.name: camel.component.atomix-messaging.ephemeral
camel.component.atomix-messaging.ephemer.description: Sets if the local member should join groups as PersistentMember or not. If set to ephemeral the local member will receive an auto generated ID thus the local one is ignored.

camel.component.atomix-messaging.readCon.name: camel.component.atomix-messaging.readConsistency
camel.component.atomix-messaging.readCon.description: The read consistency level. One of: [ATOMIC] [ATOMIC_LEASE] [SEQUENTIAL] [LOCAL]
